uk.ac.gate.cloud.client

Class GZIPThresholdOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • org.apache.commons.io.output.ThresholdingOutputStream
        • uk.ac.gate.cloud.client.GZIPThresholdOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable

    public class GZIPThresholdOutputStream
extends org.apache.commons.io.output.ThresholdingOutputStream
    Output stream that decides whether or not to GZIP compress the data based on the total amount written. If the stream is closed before the threshold is reached, then the data is sent as-is, otherwise the "Content-Encoding" header is set on the connection and the data is sent with GZIP compression.
